channel.title: BusinessWeek -- The Business Week
channel.description: Jim Ellis joins Business Week editors and writers and outside thinkers in a wrap-up of the week's top business stories. A fast-paced wrap-up with interviews and analysis by leading commentators, and advice to make your financial life richer and easier
channel.itunes:subtitle: Jim Ellis joins Business Week editors and writers and outside thinkers in a wrap-up of the week's top business stories.
channel.itunes:author: BusinessWeek
channel.itunes:keywords: Business News, Economy, Management, Career, Personal finance, Investing, Analysis, Economic Commentary
channel.itunes:summary: "The Business Week" features Assistant Managing Editor Jim Ellis interviewing Business Week writers and editors about the top business and economic news stories of the week. This fast-paced wrap-up also includes insightful interviews and analysis by leading outside commentators as well as tips and advice to make your financial life richer and easier to manage.
